p: A real-time RT-PCR [ 96] that targets the 3 untranslated regions has been reported with detection to 112 TCID 50/mL. A multiplex real-time RT-PCR for detection of JEV, yellow fever virus, West Nile virus, dengue virus (serotypes 1–4), and St. Louis encephalitis virus has been reported [ 97] with a sensitivity of 2 PFU/mL. Real-time RT-LAMP [ 98, 99] assays have been developed for detection of JEV with detection levels as low as 0.1 PFU.
